Package ch.swissqr.pdf

Class DocumentBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.swissqr.pdf.DocumentBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Document, PaymentSlipPDF
    public class DocumentBase
extends Object
    Common functionality for all PDF documents
    Author:
    pschatzmann

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DocumentBase()
      Creates an empty PDF document
      DocumentBase​(File file)
      Opens the document from the indicated pdf file
      DocumentBase​(InputStream is)
      Opens a document from the input stream which contains the PDF document
